mapper.insert: INSERT INTO inquiry ( user_num, inquiry_title, inquiry_content, inquiry_status, inquiry_create_at, inquiry_update_at, inquiry_reply ) VALUES ( #{userNum}, #{inquiryTitle}, #{inquiryContent}, #{inquiryStatus}, #{inquiryCreateAt}, #{inquiryUpdateAt}, #{inquiryReply} )
mapper.select: SELECT inquiry_id, user_num, inquiry_title, inquiry_content, inquiry_status, inquiry_create_at, inquiry_update_at, inquiry_reply FROM inquiry ORDER BY inquiry_create_at DESC
